title: MerchantSkuGet
description: This schema represents a merchant SKU

product_title.description:
Short product description

			#Valid Values

			1 to 500 alphanumeric characters

jet_browse_node_id.description:
The unique ID that defines where the product will be found in the Jet.com browse structure.

			#Valid Values

			This must be a valid jet_browse_node_id

status.description:
The products status after a merchant SKU is uploaded to Jet.com.

			#Valid Values 

			* Rejected - The SKU is missing required values
			* Processing - The SKU is current being processed in Jet's product catalog
			* Listing Data Needed - More data is needed to list the product on Jet.com
			* Ready To List - The product can be listed on Jet.com and requires inventory
			* Available For Purchase - The product is listed on Jet.com and can be purchased by a customer

sub_status.description:
The product's sub status.  A product may exist in multiple sub statuses at the same time.

			#Valid Values

			* Image Needed - A main image is needed to list the product on Jet.com
			* Price Needed - A price is needed to list the product on Jet.com
			* Attribute Data Needed - Additional preferred attributes are requested but not required (the product can be listed without clearing this sub status)

jet_retail_sku.description: The unique ID for an individually selectable product for sale on Jet.com.

amazon_item_type_keyword.description: ItemType allows customers to find your products as they browse to the most specific item types.  Please use the exact selling from Amazon's browse tree guides

category_path.description: Please enter a category path using your own product taxonomy

standard_product_codes.description:
The barcode or barcode that is associated with the product

			#Logic

			At least one of the following must be provided for each merchant SKU: Standard Product Code (UPC, GTIN-14 etc.), ASIN, or Brand and Manufacturer Part Number

ASIN.description:
Amazon standard identification number for this merchant SKU if available. 

			#Logic

			At least one of the following must be provided for each merchant SKU: Standard Product Code (UPC, GTIN-14 etc.), ASIN, or Brand and Manufacturer Part Number

multipack_quantity.description: Number of items with the given standard_product_code that makes up your merchant SKU

brand.description:
Brand of the merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 100 characters

			#Logic

			At least one of the following must be provided for each merchant SKU: Standard Product Code (UPC, GTIN-14 etc.), ASIN, or Brand and Manufacturer Part Number

manufacturer.description:
Manufacturer of the merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 100 characters

mfr_part_number.description:
Part number provided by the original manufacturer of the merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

			#Logic

			At least one of the following must be provided for each merchant SKU: Standard Product Code (UPC, GTIN-14 etc.), ASIN, or Brand and Mfr Part Number

product_description.description:
Long description of the merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 2000 characters

bullets.description:
merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters each

			#Array Limitation

			Maximum 5 elements of the 'bullets' array

number_units_for_price_per_unit.description: For Price Per Unit calculations, the number of units included in the merchant SKU. The unit of measure must be specified in order to indicate what is being measured by the unit-count.

type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit.description: The type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit attribute is a label for the number_units_for_price_per_unit. The price per unit can then be constructed by dividing the selling price by the number of units and appending the text "per unit value." For example, for a six-pack of soda, number_units_for_price_per_unit= 6, type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit= can, price per unit = price per can.

shipping_weight_pounds.description:
Weight of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_length_inches.description:
Length of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_width_inches.description:
Width of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_height_inches.description:
Height of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_length_inches.description:
Length of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_width_inches.description:
Width of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_height_inches.description:
Height of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

prop_65.description: You must tell us if your product is subject to Proposition 65 rules and regulations.  Proposition 65 requires merchants to provide California consumers with special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm, if those products expose consumers to such materials above certain threshold levels.  The default value for this is "False," so if you do not populate this column, we will assume your product is not subject to this rule.  Please view this Web site for more information: http://www.oehha.ca.gov/.

legal_disclaimer_description.description:
Any legal language required to be displayed with the product.

			#Valid Values

			Maximum of 500 characters

enum: choking hazard contains a small ball
choking hazard is a small ball

cpsia_cautionary_statements.description:
Use this field to indicate if a cautionary statement relating to the choking hazards of children's toys and games applies to your product.  These cautionary statements are defined in Section 24 of the Federal Hazardous Substances Act and Section 105 of the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2008.  They must be displayed on the product packaging and in certain online and catalog advertisements.  You are responsible for determining if a cautionary statement applies to the product.  This can be verified by contacting the product manufacturer or checking the product packaging.   Cautionary statements that you select will be displayed on the product detail page.  If no cautionary statement applies to the product, select "no warning applicable".

			#Valid Values

			*choking hazard balloon

			*choking hazard contains a marble

			*choking hazard contains a small ball

			*choking hazard is a marble

			*choking hazard is a small ball

			*choking hazard small parts

			*no warning applicable

			#Array Limitation

			Maximum 4 elements of the 'cpsia_cautionary_statements' array

country_of_origin.description:
The country that the item was manufactured in.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

safety_warning.description:
If applicable, use to supply any associated warnings for your product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

start_selling_date.description:
If updating merchant SKU that has quantity = 0  at all FCs, date that the inventory in this message should be available for sale on Jet.com.  

			#Logic

			You should only use this field if the quantity for the merchant SKU is 0 at all merchant_fcs. This date should be in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffff-HH:MM

            Example: 1988-01-01T01:43:30.0000000-07:00

fulfillment_time.description:
Number of business days from receipt of an order for the given merchant SKU until it will be shipped (only populate if it is different than your account default).

			#Valid Values

			0 = ships the day the OrderMessage is received

			1 = ships one business day after the 'merchant_order' is received

			2= ships two business days after the 'merchant_order' is received

			N = ships N business days after the 'merchant_order' is received

msrp.description:
Manufacturer's suggested retail price or list price for the product.

			#Valid Values

			A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.

map_price.description:
Retailer price for the product for which member savings will be applied (if applicable, see map_implementation)

			#Valid Values

			A number up to 9 digits in total, which consists of up to 7 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point.  Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.

map_implementation.description:
The type of rule that indicates how Jet member savings are allowed to be applied to an item’s base price (which is referred to as map_price in the API documentation)

			#Valid Values

			*'101' = Default: no restrictions on product based pricing

			*'102' = MAP Pricing: Jet member savings on product only visible to logged in Jet members

			*'103' = Minimum Selling Price: Jet member savings never applied to product

ormd.description: If true, the SKU contains limited hazardous material that make it unsafe to ship using certain shipping methods

product_tax_code.description:
Jet's standard code for the tax properties of a given product.

			#Valid Values

			*'Adult Diapers'
			*'Athletic Clothing'
			*'Baby Supplies'
			*'Bandages and First Aid Kits'
			*'Bathing Suits'
			*'Beverages with 51 to 99 Percent Juice'
			*'Bottled Water Plain'
			*'Braces and Supports'
			*'Breast Pumps'
			*'Candy'
			*'Candy with Flour'
			*'Car Seats'
			*'Carbonated Soft Drinks'
			*'Contact Lens Solution'
			*'Contraceptives'
			*'Costumes'
			*'Diabetic Supplies'
			*'Dietary Supplements'
			*'Disposable Infant Diapers'
			*'Disposable Wipes'
			*'Drinks under 50 Percent Juice'
			*'Durable Medical Equipment'
			*'Feminine Hygiene Products'
			*'Fluoride Toothpaste'
			*'General Clothing'
			*'General Grocery Items'
			*'Generic Taxable Product'
			*'Handkerchiefs'
			*'Helmets'
			*'Infant Clothing'
			*'Medicated Personal Care Items'
			*'Mobility Equipment'
			*'Non Taxable Product'
			*'Non-Motorized Boats'
			*'Oral Care Products'
			*'OTC Medication'
			*'OTC Pet Meds'
			*'Paper Products'
			*'Pet Foods'
			*'Safety Clothing'
			*'Shoe Insoles'
			*'Smoking Cessation'
			*'Sparkling Water'
			*'SPF Suncare Products'
			*'Sweatbands'
			*'Thermometers'
			*'Toilet Paper'

no_return_fee_adjustment.description:
Overides the category level setting for this fee adjustment; this is the increase in commision you are willing to pay on this product if the customer waives their ability to return it.  

			If you want to increase the commission you are willing to pay from a base rate of 15% to 17%, then you should enter '0.02'

			#Valid Values

			A mumber with up to 1 digit allowed to the left of the deimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point.

exclude_from_fee_adjustments.description: This SKU will not be subject to any fee adjustment rules that are set up if this field is 'true'

ships_alone.description:
If this field is 'true', it indicates that this 'merchant SKU' will always ship on its own.    
			A separate 'merchant_order' will always be placed for this 'merchant_SKU', one consequence of this will be that this merchant_sku will never contriube to any basket size fee adjustments with any other merchant_skus.

main_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access the image. The images should be 1500 x 1500 pixels or larger, but anything 500 x 500 pixels or larger is acceptable. There is no limit to image size.

swatch_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access an image of a color or fabric for a given merchant SKU. The images should be 1500 x 1500 pixels or larger, but anything 500 x 500 pixels or larger is acceptable.  There is no limit to image size.

relationship.description:
Variation or Accessory

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set merchant SKUs

			##Valid Values

			*Variation

			*Accessory

group_title.description:
The title of the product group.  This should not included attributes.

			#Valid Values

			5 to 500 alphanumeric characters

variation_refinements.description:
The attribute IDs associated with the characteristic the parent-children SKUs relate on
            
            #Valid Values

            A Jet attribute or attributes that were uploaded for the products associated with the variation

children_skus.description:
The merchant SKUs that are a the child SKUs
				
			#Valid Values

			Must be a merchant SKU that you have sent us

ormd.description: If true, the SKU contains limited hazardous material that make it unsafe to ship using certain shipping methods

buy_url.description: The buy URL where this product is located.

fulfillment_node_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given fulfillment node

correlation_id.description: The ID associated with a pricing control message

price.description: The price for the merchant SKU

time_to_return.description: The number of days after purchase a customer can return the item

return_location_ids.description: Jet's unique ID for a given returns location

return_shipping_methods.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home

            #Valid Values
            * 'UPS Ground'
            * 'FedEx Ground'
            * 'Freight'

attribute_id.description: the node Attribute ID Number that you get from Jet provided documentation that corresponds with the attribute you are passing

attribute_value.description: The value for the attribute. For example, if the attribute is size you may pass 'large' or if the the attribute is weight, you may pass '22'. For attributes like weight, the unit will be passed in the next field

attribute_value_unit.description: If the attribute_value requires a unit, then you pass the unit here.

standard_product_code.description:
A standard, unique identifier for a product.  ISBN-10, ISBN-13, UPC, EAN and GTIN-14 are accepted.

					#Valid Values

					*If standard_product_code_type is'UPC' - must be 12 digits

					*If standard_product_code_type is 'ISBN-13' - must be 13 digits

					*If standard_product_code_type is 'ISBN-10' - must be 10 digits

					*If standard_product_code_type is 'EAN' - must be 13 digits

					*If standard_product_code_type is 'GTIN-14' - must be 14 digits

standard_product_code_type.description:
Indicate the type of standard_product_code that was used.

					#Valid Values

					*UPC

					*ISBN-13

					*ISBN-10

					*EAN

					*GTIN-14

image_slot_id.description: The slot that the alternate image should be uploaded to.  Jet.com supports up to 8 images (or 8 image slots).

image_url.description: The absolute location where Jet.com can retrieve the image

items.title: ShippingExceptionItem
items.description: Shipping exception of particular fulfillment node

service_level.description:
Generic descriptions of shipment delivery times

                        #Logic 
                        This field should be used if you are defining your shipping options by service_level 
                        
                        #Valid Values 
                        *Standard
                        *Expedited 
                        *Scheduled
                        *NextDay 
                        *SecondDay

shipping_method.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home

                        #Logic 
                        This should be used if you want the change to apply to a specific shipping_method.  If shipping_carrier is populated, this field will be ignored. Use this field if you are defining your shipping
                        options by 'shipping_method'

override_type.description:
The type of shipping override, "Additional charge" or "Override charge" (Override Charge could be used to lower shipping)

                        #Valid Values

                        *'Additional charge' - A charge that is added to the default shipping charge 
                        *'Override charge' - A charge that overrides the default shipping charge

shipping_charge_amount.description:
The amount added to your default shipping charge when "OverrideType"= "Additional charge" and the total amount charged when "OverrideType" =  "Override charge"

                        #Logic 
                        
                        This field is required if override_type is populated

shipping_exception_type.description:
Indicates if you want the product to be shipped exclusively (only with) or restrictively (not including) via the shipping level of shipping method provided

                        #Valid Values
                        * restricted - The product cannot be shipped using the shipping method or shipping level provided
                        * exclusive - The product should only be shipped using the shipping method or shipping level provided

per_unit.description: If true, the shipping charge amount will be applied per unit.  Otherwise, the default will divide shipping cost evenly among the number of units ordered
